user_question: What are the environmental impacts of Bitcoin mining and generate an image of a futuristic eco-friendly cryptocurrency mining facility?
final_answer: Bitcoin mining has significant environmental impacts due to high energy consumption, often relying on fossil fuels, leading to increased carbon emissions. Image of a futuristic eco-friendly cryptocurrency mining facility generated. Current initiatives to make Bitcoin mining more sustainable include using renewable energy, improving hardware efficiency, and carbon offset programs.
